title: The Spoken word
creator_credit: Colin Park, Michael Milan and University of Otago. Dept. of Education and Visual Learning Centre
brief_description: Discusses the development of language and its relationship to the developing child. The role of the parent in language development is shown as a high priority and examples are given of adults assisting children towards a more developed form of language in the home and school situations.
